jobDescription: An opportunity to join a fast-growing FinTech company and play a pivotal role in the development of a customer marketing program, including a review of our platform, data, creative and contact strategies.  We’re looking for a Email Marketing Manager to help reimagine our CRM and build a best-in-class experience. You’ll focus on our customer’s lifecycles and be heavily involved in designing and delivering creative, automation and messaging to improve conversion.  This is a big opportunity to make your own mark, think-big and work with multiple channels, including email, DM, targeted display and targeted social.
